title: I got an claim letter from law office of insurance company. what I can do. I don't have the ability to pay back.
question: I make an unsafe u-turn in the early morning. The coming car from opposite direction failed to maintain proper vigilance of his vehicle and hit another car on the road.
answers:
You should really get a local car accident lawyer to work something out with them, as it seems that they are trying to take advantage of you. A local car accident lawyer will give you a free consultation and most likely resolve this for a small fee.

There may be arguments potentially in your defense as to liablity, but without great detail, it is not possible to assess.

There are practical issues, such as your financial ability to pay, which can affect what the other 2 ins cos may agree to, and what you can do in defending yourself. Depending upon your assets, income, and other debts, you may want to consult with a bankruptcy lawyer. Can you really afford to pay 2500. from a student loan?

You need to communicate to the law office of the insurance company that you have absolutely no ability to pay. In most instances, you have to provide financial information. Your goal is to communicate with them (not ignore them), and persuade Allstate not to file a lawsuit against you for the $9,228.
